name: 64inch Flat Screen TV
description: A television is an electronic device for viewing shows, movies, and broadcasts, featuring a screen and built-in speakers. Modern TVs offer HD or 4K resolution, smart capabilities, and connectivity for various devices. They are essential for entertainment in living rooms, bedrooms, and home theaters.

name: Cushions
description: Cushions are soft, cozy accessories that add comfort and style to any space. They enhance decor with a variety of colors and textures. Perfect for lounging or as decorative accents in your home.

name: Kitchen Set
description: A kitchen set includes essential utensils and cookware for efficient meal preparation, such as pots, pans, knives, and measuring tools.
